The claim was published on Facebook on F: 2020, and has been shared over 500 times.
The post includes a screenshot with Hind: language text claiming the discovery of 3,500 tonnes of gold in Sonbhadra district, Uttar Pradesh.
The Geological Survey of India: GSI) has stated that they have not estimated such a vast resource of gold in Sonbhadra district. The GSI Director mentioned that the estimated amount of gold that could be extracted is around 160 kilograms.
